揬字的基本解释

揬
tú
〔搪揬〕古同“唐突”。
揩。

揬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tú］
［《廣韻》陀骨切，入没，定。］
见“搪揬”。

揬字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　揬； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页444第04
【唐韻】【韻會】陀骨切【集韻】陀沒切，?音突。搪揬，觸也。　又通作唐突。【正字通】揬突雖通，搪揬可借突，而竈突不可用揬，正韻註混。

揬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
揬字的起名意思

暂无。

欬
Basic explanation of words
欬
tú
〔蹬揬〕The ancient same "abrupt".
wipe.
欬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tú］
["Guangyun" Tuo bone cut, enter the end, set. ]
See "prevarication".
欬
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao concentrated] [Hand Character Department] 　揬; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 444 04
[Tang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Tuo bone cut [Ji Yun] Tuo did not cut,? The sound is sudden. Prevarication, touch also.　It was abrupt again. 【Zhengzitong】Although 欬tu is good, it can be used for prevarication, but the focus cannot be used, and the rhyme is mixed.
